models.name: minimal_todo_taskusers
models.description: User account information for authentication and identity management. Stores essential details required for secure system access and account recovery.

foreignFields.name: minimal_todo_organizer_member_id
foreignFields.description: The organizer member associated with this user account {@link minimal_todo_taskusers.id}. Links the user to their organizer membership if applicable.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Verified email address used for authentication and account recovery. Must be unique across all users.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Securely hashed password using industry-standard algorithms. Never stored or transmitted in plaintext.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the user account was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of the last account modification.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the account was marked for deletion. Null for active accounts.

models.name: minimal_todo_sessions
models.description: Active user session tracking for authentication management. Maintains security tokens and validity periods to control access to protected resources.

foreignFields.name: minimal_todo_taskuser_id
foreignFields.description: Belonged task user's {@link minimal_todo_taskusers.id}. References the user account associated with this session.

plainFields.name: token
plainFields.description: Cryptographically secure session token used for authentication. Must be transmitted securely.

plainFields.name: expires_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this session token expires and becomes invalid.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the session was created.

plainFields.name: ip_address
plainFields.description: IP address from which the session was initiated. Used for security monitoring.

models.name: minimal_todo_password_resets
models.description: Temporary tokens for secure password recovery process. Manages the lifecycle of password reset requests with strict expiration policies.

foreignFields.name: minimal_todo_taskuser_id
foreignFields.description: Associated task user's {@link minimal_todo_taskusers.id}. Links the reset token to the user account requesting recovery.

plainFields.name: token
plainFields.description: Single-use cryptographically secure token for password reset verification.

plainFields.name: expires_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this reset token expires and becomes invalid (15 minutes after creation).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the reset request was initiated.

models.name: minimal_todo_tasks
models.description: Core business entity representing user tasks in the minimalTodo application. Contains essential information about intended work items including title, status, and timestamps. Represents the fundamental value proposition of the Todo application as a standalone entity that delivers the primary user value. This model enables users to create, track, and complete tasks with minimal complexity while preserving historical context through timestamp tracking. All operations revolve around this entity as it embodies the minimalist philosophy of the entire application.

plainFields.name: title
plainFields.description: Title of the task representing what needs to be done. Limited to 100 characters to ensure conciseness and compatibility with minimal interface design.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current business status of the task with only two valid values: 'incomplete' (default) and 'complete'. Maintains simplicity by avoiding additional states consistent with minimal feature philosophy.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp representing when the task was initially created. Preserved as an immutable business record of when the user conceived the work item.

plainFields.name: completed_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp recording when the task was marked complete. Used for historical accuracy and completion tracking while maintaining business integrity.
